title: INtech
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: Bluesky rolls out cashtags and LIVE badges amid a boost in app installs
items.description: Bluesky adds new features to its app amid a boost in installs due to the deepfake drama on X.

items.title: YouTube relaxes monetization guidelines for some controversial topics
items.description: These controversial topics include self-harm, abortion, suicide, and domestic and sexual abuse.

items.title: Italy investigates Activision Blizzard for pushing in-game purchases
items.description: Italy has launched two investigations into Microsoft's Activision Blizzard, alleging the company has engaged in "misleading and aggressive" sales prac...

items.title: Chinese EVs inch closer to the US as Canada slashes tariffs
items.description: The country is dropping its import tax from 100% to just 6.1%, with an initial annual cap of 49,000 cars.

items.title: The rise of ‘micro’ apps: non-developers are writing apps instead of buying them
items.description: A new era of app creation is here. It's fun, it's fast, and it's fleeting.

items.title: 9 Best Wi-Fi Routers of 2026 for Working, Gaming, and Streaming
items.description: Don’t suffer the buffer. These WIRED-tested home routers will deliver reliable internet across your home, whatever your needs or budget.

items.title: Former USDS Leaders Launch Tech Reform Project to Fix What DOGE Broke
items.description: The plan, which is still in its early stages, is spearheaded by former USDS administrator Mikey Dickerson.

items.title: Smart Plug Guide (2026): When You Should and Shouldn’t Use One
items.description: Smart plugs can add controls to any outlet, but they aren’t perfect for everything. Here’s our guide to using one and which ones to buy.

items.title: Why Everyone Is Suddenly in a ‘Very Chinese Time’ in Their Lives
items.description: The viral meme isn’t really about China or actual Chinese people. It's a symbol of what Americans believe their own country has lost.

items.title: How Does the Hive Mind Work in ‘Pluribus?
items.description: The “Joining” seems to connect people via radio waves. Let’s dig into the physics at play.
